description: Compensates for shading in the corners of the screen

items.label: Auto
items.description: Automatically compensates for darkness in the corners of the screen.

items.label: Off
items.description: Turns off compensation for corner darkness.

hint: Sets whether to automatically compensate for darkness in the corners of the screen. ([Auto]/[Low]/[Off])
note: This function is only available when using an automatic compensation compliant lens. Darkness in the corners of the screen may not be corrected with [Shading Comp.], depending on the lens type. There may be no difference in the correction effect between [Auto] and [Low] in [Shading Comp.], depending on the lens type.
